00070         {
00071                 if (m_pPgOptions == NULL) {Err::errAbort("PgOptionsSAXHandler must be constructed with a valid PgOptions pointer.");}

00081         void startDocument() {m_uiOptionCount = 0;}
00082         void endDocument()
00083         {
00084                 if (m_strAnalysis != "")
00085                 {
00086                         Verbose::out(1, "\tanalysis = " + m_strAnalysis);
00087                         if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt("analysis")->m_allowMultiple)
00088                         {
00089                                 m_pPgOptions->push("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00090                         }
00091                         else
00092                         {
00093                                 m_pPgOptions->set("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00094                         }
00095                 }
00096         }
00097         static std::string toString(const XMLCh* const in)
00098         {
00099                 char* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(in);
00100                 AffxString str = p;
00101                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
00102                 return str.trim();
00103         }
00104     void startElement(const XMLCh* const name, XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::AttributeList& attributes)
00105         {
00106                 std::string strElementName = toString(name);
00107 //              Verbose::out(1, "Element=" + strElementName);
00108                 m_uiOptionCount++;
00109                 AffxString strCategoryName;
00110                 std::string strOptionName;
00111                 std::string strDescription;
00112                 std::string strCurrentValue;
00113                 std::string strGuid;
00114                 for (unsigned int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < attributes.getLength()); iIndex++)
00115                 {
00116                         std::string strAttributeName = toString(attributes.getName(iIndex));
00117                         std::string strAttributeType = toString(attributes.getType(iIndex));
00118                         std::string strAttributeValue = toString(attributes.getValue(iIndex));
00119 //                      Verbose::out(1, "AttributeName=" + strAttributeName + ", AttributeType=" + strAttributeType + ", AttributeValue=" + strAttributeValue);
00120                         if ((strElementName == "ParameterFile") && (strAttributeName == "guid")) 
00121                         {
00122                                 Verbose::out(1, "\tguid = " + strAttributeValue);
00123                                 if (m_pPgOptions->getXMLParameterFileGuid() == "")
00124                                 {
00125                                         m_pPgOptions->m_strXMLParameterFileGuid = strAttributeValue; 
00126                                 }
00127                                 break;
00128                         }                       
00129                         else if ((strElementName == "JobOrder") && (strAttributeName == "joGUID")) 
00130                         {
00131                                 Verbose::out(1, "\tguid = " + strAttributeValue);
00132                                 if (m_pPgOptions->getXMLParameterFileGuid() == "")
00133                                 {
00134                                         m_pPgOptions->m_strXMLParameterFileGuid = strAttributeValue; 
00135                                 }
00136                                 break;
00137                         }
00138                         else if (strAttributeName == "analysis") {strCategoryName = strAttributeValue;}
00139                         else if (strAttributeName == "name") {strOptionName = strAttributeValue;}
00140                         else if (strAttributeName == "description") {strDescription = strAttributeValue;}
00141                         else if (strAttributeName == "currentValue") {strCurrentValue = strAttributeValue;}
00142                 }
00143                 if (strElementName == "Parameter")
00144                 {
00145                         if (strCategoryName != "")
00146                         {
00147                                 if (!m_pPgOptions->isOptDefined("analysis")) 
00148                                 {
00149                                         Verbose::out(1, "Specified option is not defined. Name: " + strOptionName);
00150                                 }
00151                                 else
00152                                 {
00153                                         if (strCategoryName != m_strPrevCategory)
00154                                         {
00155                                                 if (m_strAnalysis != "")
00156                                                 {
00157                                                         Verbose::out(1, "\tanalysis = " + m_strAnalysis);
00158                                                         if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt("analysis")->m_allowMultiple)
00159                                                         {
00160                                                                 m_pPgOptions->push("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00161                                                         }
00162                                                         else
00163                                                         {
00164                                                                 m_pPgOptions->set("analysis", m_strAnalysis);
00165                                                         }
00166                                                 }
00167                                                 if (strCurrentValue == "")
00168                                                 {
00169                                                         m_strAnalysis = strOptionName;
00170                                                 }
00171                                         }
00172                                         else
00173                                         {
00174                                                 if (strCurrentValue != "")
00175                                                 {
00176         //                                              if (::getInt(::getInt(strCurrentValue)) == strCurrentValue)
00177         //                                              {
00178         //                                                      m_strAnalysis += "." + strOptionName + "=" + strCurrentValue;
00179         //                                              }
00180         //                                              else
00181         //                                              {
00182                                                                 m_strAnalysis += "." + strOptionName + "='" + strCurrentValue + "'";
00183         //                                              }
00184                                                 }
00185                                         }
00186                                         m_strPrevCategory = strCategoryName;
00187                                 }
00188                         }
00189                         else
00190                         {
00191                                 if (m_pPgOptions->isOptDefined(strOptionName))
00192                                 {
00193                                         Verbose::out(1, "\t" + strOptionName + " = " + strCurrentValue);
00194                                         if (strOptionName == "xml-file") {
00195             m_pPgOptions->setOptionsFromXMLFile(strCurrentValue, *m_pvFileNames);
00196           }
00197                                         else 
00198                                         {
00199                                                 if (m_pPgOptions->mustFindOpt(strOptionName)->m_allowMultiple)
00200                                                 {
00201                                                         m_pPgOptions->push(strOptionName, strCurrentValue);
00202                                                 }
00203                                                 else
00204                                                 {
00205                                                         m_pPgOptions->set(strOptionName, strCurrentValue);
00206                                                 }
00207                                         }
00208                                 }
00209                                 else 
00210                                 {
00211                                         Verbose::out(1, "Specified option is not defined. Name: " + strOptionName);
00212                                 }
00213                         }
00214                 }
00215         }
00216 };

00226 PgOpt::PgOpt() {
00227   // set to known starting values.
00228   m_shortName="";
00229   m_longName="";
00230   m_help="";
00231   m_type=PgOpt::INVALID_OPT;
00232   m_defaultValue="";
00233   m_values.resize(0);
00234   // default is no multiples
00235   m_allowMultiple=0;
00236 }

00280 std::string PgOpt::getValue(size_t idx) const {
00281   // off the end.
00282   if (idx<0) {
00283     Err::errAbort("Out of bounds. (idx<0)");
00284   }
00285   // No value is set, return the defaultValue.
00286   if (m_values.size()==0) {
00287     return getDefaultValue();
00288   }
00289   if (idx<m_values.size()) {
00290     return m_values[idx];
00291   }
00292   // opps
00293   Err::errAbort("Out of bounds. (idx>size)");
00294   return string("internal error");
00295 }
00296 //
00297 bool PgOpt::getValueBool(int idx) const {
00298   return Convert::toBool(getValue(idx));
00299 }
00300 int PgOpt::getValueInt(int idx) const {
00301   return Convert::toInt(getValue(idx));
00302 }
00303 double PgOpt::getValueDouble(int idx) const {
00304   return Convert::toDouble(getValue(idx));
00305 }

00307 void PgOpt::push_user_values_into(std::vector<std::string>& dest_vec)
00308 {
00309   for (size_t i=0;i<m_values.size();i++) {
00310     dest_vec.push_back(m_values[i]);
00311   }

00313 
00314 void PgOpt::dump() const
00315 {
00316   printf("%-20s : ",m_longName.c_str());
00317   if (getValueCount()==0) {
00318     printf("<%s>",getValue(0).c_str());
00319   }
00320   else {
00321     int cnt=getValueCount();
00322     for (int i=0;i<cnt;i++) {
00323       printf("'%s'",getValue(i).c_str());
00324       if (i!=cnt-1) {
00325         printf(",");
00326       }
00327     }
00328   }
00329   printf("\n");
00330 }
00331 
00332 int PgOpt::checkParseIsOk(const std::string& value) const {
00333   bool success;
00334 
00335   if (m_type == INT_OPT) {
00336     Convert::toIntCheck(value, &success);
00337     if(!success) {
00338       Err::errAbort( "Argument for option: '" + m_longName + " (" + m_shortName + ") is not an integer: " + value);
00339     }
00340   }
00341   else if (m_type == DOUBLE_OPT) {
00342     Convert::toDoubleCheck(value, &success);
00343     if(!success) {
00344       Err::errAbort( "Argument for option: '" + m_longName + " (" + m_shortName + ") is not a double: " + value);
00345     }
00346   }
00347   // yes.
00348   return 1;
00349 }

00362 void PgOptions::clear() {
00363   //
00364   m_progName = "";
00365   m_usageMsg = "";
00366   m_strXMLParameterFileName.clear();
00367   m_strXMLParameterFileGuid.clear();
00368   //
00369   m_argv.clear();
00370   m_args.clear();
00371   //
00372   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00373     delete m_option_vec[i];
00374   }
00375   m_option_vec.clear();
00376   m_option_section.clear();
00377   m_option_map.clear();
00378 
00379 }
00380 
00381 PgOptions& PgOptions::operator=(const PgOptions &options) {
00382   if(this == &options) return *this;
00383 
00384   clear();
00385 
00386   m_progName = options.m_progName;
00387   m_argv = options.m_argv;
00388   m_args = options.m_args;
00389   m_usageMsg = options.m_usageMsg;
00390   //
00391   appendOptions(options);
00392   //
00393  return *this;
00394 }
00395 
00396 void PgOptions::appendOptions(const PgOptions &options)
00397 {
00398   // where do our options end?
00399   int initial_end=m_option_vec.size();
00400   // add all the new options.
00401   for(int i=0; i<options.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00402     addPgOpt(options.m_option_vec[i]);
00403   }
00404   // now add the section headings, adjusted for end.
00405   std::map<int,std::string>::const_iterator iter;
00406   for(iter = options.m_option_section.begin(); iter != options.m_option_section.end(); iter++) {
00407     m_option_section[initial_end+iter->first] = iter->second;
00408   }
00409 }
00410 
00411 PgOptions::PgOptions(const PgOptions &options) {
00412   m_progName = options.m_progName;
00413   m_argv = options.m_argv;
00414   m_args = options.m_args;
00415   m_usageMsg = options.m_usageMsg;
00416   m_strXMLParameterFileName=options.m_strXMLParameterFileName;
00417   m_strXMLParameterFileGuid=options.m_strXMLParameterFileGuid;
00418 
00419   for(int i=0; i<options.m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00420       addPgOpt(options.m_option_vec[i]);
00421   }
00422 
00423   std::map<int,std::string>::const_iterator iter;
00424   for(iter = options.m_option_section.begin(); iter != options.m_option_section.end(); iter++) {
00425       m_option_section[iter->first] = iter->second;
00426   }
00427 }

00456 void PgOptions::setArgv(const char * const * const argv) {
00457   m_argv.clear();
00458 
00459   for (const char* const * arg=argv;*arg!=NULL;arg++) {
00460     m_argv.push_back(*arg);
00461   }
00462   //
00463   if (0<m_argv.size()) {
00464     m_progName=m_argv[0];
00465   }

00467 
00468 std::string PgOptions::commandLine() {
00469   std::ostringstream stream;
00470   int m_argv_size=m_argv.size();
00471 
00472   if (0<m_argv_size) {
00473     stream << m_argv[0];
00474     for (int i=1;i<m_argv_size;i++) {
00475       stream << " ";
00476       stream << m_argv[i];
00477     }
00478   }
00479   return stream.str();
00480 }

00490 void PgOptions::bind(const std::string& opt_name,PgOpt* opt)
00491 {
00492   // dont add the null string.
00493   if (opt_name!="") {
00494     m_option_map[opt_name]=opt;
00495   }
00496 }
00497 
00498 PgOpt* PgOptions::addPgOpt(const PgOpt* opt)
00499 {
00500   // We didnt create this option so copy it.
00501   PgOpt* opt_copy=new PgOpt(opt);
00502   return addPgOpt_nocopy(opt_copy);
00503 }
00504 
00505 PgOpt* PgOptions::addPgOpt_nocopy(PgOpt* opt)
00506 {
00507   //
00508   opt->checkParseIsOk(opt->getDefaultValue());
00509   //
00510   optionMapIterator_t i = m_option_map.find(opt->m_longName);
00511   if(i!=m_option_map.end()) {
00512     Err::errAbort("Option '" + opt->m_longName + "' already defined.");
00513   }
00514   // we will eventually free every opt in this vector.
00515   m_option_vec.push_back(opt);
00516   //
00517   bind(opt->m_longName,opt);
00518   bind(opt->m_shortName,opt);
00519   //
00520   return opt;
00521 }
00522 
00523 void PgOptions::defineOptionSection(const std::string &sectionName) {
00524   m_option_section[(int)m_option_vec.size()] = sectionName;
00525 }
00526 
00527 PgOpt* PgOptions::defineOption(const std::string& shortName,
00528                                const std::string& longName,
00529                                PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00530                                const std::string& help,
00531                                const std::string& defaultValue)
00532 {
00533   PgOpt* opt=new PgOpt;
00534   // copy all the data
00535   opt->m_shortName=shortName;
00536   opt->m_longName=longName;
00537   opt->m_type=type;
00538   opt->m_help=help;
00539   opt->m_defaultValue=defaultValue;
00540   opt->m_values.resize(0);
00541   // add
00542   return addPgOpt_nocopy(opt);
00543 }
00544 
00545 PgOpt* PgOptions::defOpt(const std::string& shortName,
00546                          const std::string& longName,
00547                          PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00548                          const std::string& help,
00549                          const std::string& defaultValue)
00550 {
00551   PgOpt* opt=defineOption(shortName,longName,type,help,defaultValue);
00552   return opt;
00553 }
00554 
00555 PgOpt* PgOptions::defOptMult(const std::string& shortName,
00556                              const std::string& longName,
00557                              PgOpt::PgOptType_t type,
00558                              const std::string& help,
00559                              const std::string& defaultValue)
00560 {
00561   PgOpt* opt=defineOption(shortName,longName,type,help,defaultValue);
00562   opt->allowMutipleValues(1);
00563   return opt;
00564 }
00565 
00566 PgOpt* PgOptions::findOpt(const std::string &longName) {
00567   optionMapIterator_t i = m_option_map.find(longName);
00568   if (i == m_option_map.end()) {
00569     return NULL;
00570   }
00571   return i->second;
00572 }
00573 
00574 PgOpt* PgOptions::mustFindOpt(const std::string &name) {
00575   PgOpt *opt = findOpt(name);
00576   if(opt == NULL) {
00577     Err::errAbort("Don't recognize option with name: '" + name + "'.");
00578   }
00579   return opt;
00580 }
00581 
00582 void PgOptions::printStringWidth(const std::string& str, int prefix,int currentPos, int maxWidth ) {
00583   Util::printStringWidth(cout, str, prefix, currentPos, maxWidth);
00584 }
00585 
00586 void PgOptions::usage(std::set<std::string> &hiddenOpts, bool printOpts) {
00587   PgOpt *opt = NULL;
00588   unsigned int maxLength = 0;
00589   unsigned int currentLength = 0;
00590   size_t i = 0;
00591   int extraChars = 6;
00592 
00593   cout << getUsage();
00594   cout << "\n";
00595 
00596   if(printOpts == true) {
00597     /* find the length of the longest option name. */
00598     for (i = 0; i<m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00599       opt = m_option_vec[i];
00600       // check to see if we're hiding this option.
00601       if(hiddenOpts.find(opt->m_longName) != hiddenOpts.end()) {
00602         continue;
00603       }
00604       // subtract it off if there is a character.
00605       size_t length = opt->m_longName.size();
00606       if(maxLength < length)
00607         maxLength = (int)length;
00608     }
00609     // extraChars contains a padded space for options without a short flag,
00610     // three ' ' at the beginning and one ' ' at end.
00611     maxLength += 4 + extraChars;
00612     // cap it
00613     if(maxLength > 26) {
00614       maxLength = 26;
00615     }
00616 
00617     cout << "\noptions:\n";
00618     /* Loop through and print out the help. */
00619     for(i = 0; i<m_option_vec.size(); i++) {
00620       // Do we have a section header to print?
00621       if(m_option_section.find(i) != m_option_section.end())
00622           cout << " " << m_option_section[i] << "\n";
00623 
00624       // print out the option
00625 
00626       opt = m_option_vec[i];
00627       // check to see if we're hiding this option.
00628       if(hiddenOpts.find(opt->m_longName) != hiddenOpts.end()) {
00629         continue;
00630       }
00631       // we might have a short name.
00632       if(opt->m_shortName != "") {
00633         cout <<  "   -" << opt->m_shortName << ", ";
00634       }
00635       else {
00636         cout << "     ";
00637       }
00638       // we always have a long name.
00639       cout << "--" << opt->m_longName << " ";
00640 
00641       while(currentLength < maxLength) {
00642         cout.put(' ');
00643         currentLength++;
00644       }
00645 
00646       printStringWidth(opt->m_help + " [default '" + opt->m_defaultValue + "']",
00647                        maxLength, currentLength);
00648       cout << "\n";
00649     }
00650   }
00651 }
00652 
00653 int PgOptions::parseArgv(const char * const * const argv, int start) {
00654   assert(argv!=NULL);
00655 
00656   setArgv(argv);
00657 
00658   // Loop through and match options with arguments.
00659   size_t arg_idx=start;
00660   while (arg_idx<m_argv.size() && m_argv[arg_idx] != "--") {
00661     matchOneArg(&arg_idx);
00662   }
00663 
00664   // dump the values at the end.
00665   // dump(); // debug
00666 
00667   return (int)arg_idx;
00668 }
00669 
00670 void PgOptions::resetToDefaults() {
00671   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00672     m_option_vec[i]->resetToDefault();
00673   }
00674   m_argv.resize(0);
00675   m_args.resize(0);
00676 }
00677 
00678 void PgOptions::dump() {
00679   for (size_t i=0;i<m_option_vec.size();i++) {
00680     m_option_vec[i]->dump();
00681   }
00682   printf("Args:\n");
00683   for (size_t i=0;i<m_args.size();i++) {
00684     printf("  %3d : %s\n",(int)i,m_args[i].c_str());
00685   }
00686 }
00687 
00688 void PgOptions::matchOneArg(size_t* arg_idx)
00689 {
00690   PgOpt *opt;
00691   std::string arg_opt;
00692   std::string arg_val;
00693   int have_arg_val=0;
00694   size_t idx;
00695 
00696   if (!(*arg_idx<m_argv.size())) {
00697     Err::errAbort("out of bounds");
00698   }
00699 
00700   //printf(">> %3d : %s\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00701   arg_opt=m_argv[*arg_idx];
00702   *arg_idx+=1;
00703 
00704   // No leading "-"; Add it to the args vec...
00705   if (arg_opt[0]!='-') {
00706     m_args.push_back(arg_opt);
00707     return;
00708   }
00709 
00710   // "--" terminates options; Everything following "--" is an args.
00711   if (arg_opt=="--") {
00712     while (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00713       m_args.push_back(m_argv[*arg_idx]);
00714       *arg_idx+=1;
00715     }
00716     return;
00717   }
00718 
00719   // strip off "-" or "--"
00720   if (arg_opt[0]=='-') {
00721     if (arg_opt[1]=='-') {
00722       arg_opt.erase(0,2); // "--"
00723     }
00724     else {
00725       arg_opt.erase(0,1); // "-"
00726     }
00727   }
00728   else { // no "-" shouldnt happen.
00729     Err::errAbort("Argument does not have a starting dash: '"+arg_opt+"'");
00730   }
00731 
00732   // split on "=" for 'opt=val'...
00733   idx=arg_opt.find("=");
00734   if (idx!=std::string::npos) {
00735     have_arg_val=1;
00736     arg_val.assign(arg_opt,idx+1,arg_opt.size()-(idx+1));
00737     arg_opt.erase(idx); // erase "=..."
00738   }
00739 
00740   // should have something left
00741   if (arg_opt=="") {
00742     Err::errAbort("Shouldnt have a blank argument.");
00743   }
00744 
00745   // Might this be a negated arg? (like "--no-print"?)
00746   if (arg_opt.find("no-")==0) {
00747     string arg_opt_no=arg_opt;
00748     arg_opt_no.erase(0,3);
00749     opt=findOpt(arg_opt_no);
00750     if (opt!=NULL) {
00751       if (opt->m_type!=PgOpt::BOOL_OPT) {
00752         Err::errAbort("Cant use '--no-' with '"+arg_opt_no+"': Not a boolean option.");
00753       }
00754       opt->setValue("false");
00755       return;
00756     }
00757     // didnt find it, treat it as a normal option.
00758   }
00759 
00760   opt = findOpt(arg_opt);
00761   if(opt == NULL) {
00762     Err::errAbort("Don't recognize option: '" + arg_opt + "'");
00763   }
00764 
00765 //  if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00766 //    printf("   %3d : %s\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00767 //  }
00768 
00769   if (opt->m_type == PgOpt::BOOL_OPT) {
00770     // --foo=bar
00771     if (have_arg_val==1) {
00772       opt->checkParseIsOk(arg_val);
00773       opt->setValue(arg_val);
00774     }
00775     // we might have a following "true/false"...
00776     // "--foo true"
00777     else {
00778       if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00779         bool success;
00780         // printf("test: m_argv[%d] = '%s'\n",*arg_idx,m_argv[*arg_idx].c_str()); // debug
00781         Convert::toBoolCheck(m_argv[*arg_idx], &success);
00782         if (success) {
00783           opt->setValue(m_argv[*arg_idx]);
00784           *arg_idx+=1;
00785         }
00786         else {
00787           // didnt look like a bool, use 
00788                         opt->setValue("true");
00789         }
00790       }
00791       // just "program --foo"
00792       else {
00793         opt->setValue("true");
00794       }
00795     }
00796     //
00797     return;
00798   }
00799 
00800   // Do we take the next value?
00801   if (have_arg_val==0) {
00802     if (*arg_idx<m_argv.size()) {
00803       arg_val=m_argv[*arg_idx];
00804       *arg_idx+=1;
00805     }
00806     else {
00807       arg_val="";
00808     }
00809   }
00810 
00811   // Add the value
00812   if (opt->checkParseIsOk(arg_val)==1) {
00813     if (opt->m_allowMultiple==1) {
00814       opt->pushValue(arg_val);
00815     }
00816     else {
00817           if (opt->m_longName == "xml-file") {
00818                 if (opt->isSet()) {Err::errAbort("The xml-file option has already been set. Only one xml-file can be specified.");}
00819                 std::vector<std::string> vFileNames;
00820                 setOptionsFromXMLFile(arg_val, vFileNames);
00821           }
00822       opt->setValue(arg_val);
00823     }
00824   }
00825   else {
00826     Err::errAbort("bad parse setting '" + arg_opt +"' to '" + arg_val + "'");
00827   }
00828 }
00829 
00830 void PgOptions::clear(const std::string &name)
00831 {
00832     mustFindOpt(name)->clearValues();
00833 }
00834 
00835 std::string PgOptions::get(const std::string& opt_name)
00836 {
00837   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00838   return opt->getValue(0);
00839 }
00840 bool PgOptions::getBool(const std::string& opt_name)
00841 {
00842   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00843   return opt->getValueBool(0);
00844 }
00845 double PgOptions::getDouble(const std::string& opt_name)
00846 {
00847   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00848   return opt->getValueDouble(0);
00849 }
00850 int PgOptions::getInt(const std::string& opt_name)
00851 {
00852   PgOpt *opt = mustFindOpt(opt_name);
00853   return opt->getValueInt(0);
00854 }

00857 
00858 int PgOptions::argc() {
00859   return (int)m_argv.size();
00860 }
00861 std::string PgOptions::argv(int idx) {
00862   return m_argv[idx];
00863 }
00864 
00870 void PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(const std::string& strFileNameIn, std::vector<std::string>& vFileNames)
00871 {
00872 #ifndef APT_PGOPTIONS_NO_XERCES
00873         AffxString strFileName = strFileNameIn;
00874 
00875         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00876         Verbose::out(1, "Loading options from file: " + strFileName);
00877                 
00878         if (vFileNames.size() > 7) {Err::errAbort("Possible run away recursion situation found in PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(...)");}
00879         for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)vFileNames.size()); iIndex++)
00880         {
00881                 if (AffxFile::parseFileName(strFileName) == vFileNames[iIndex]) {Err::errAbort("Possible run away recursion situation found in PgOptions::setOptionsFromXMLFile(...)");}
00882         }
00883         vFileNames.push_back(AffxFile::parseFileName(strFileName));
00884         
00885         if (m_strXMLParameterFileName == "")
00886         {
00887                 m_strXMLParameterFileName = strFileName;
00888         }
00889         // Initialize the XML4C system
00890         try
00891         {
00892                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize();
00893         }
00894 
00895         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
00896         {                                       
00897                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed at XMLPlatformUtils::Initialize(). Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
00898         }
00899         
00900         //
00901         //  Create a SAX parser object to use and create our SAX event handlers
00902         //  and plug them in.
00903         //
00904         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser* parser = new XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser;
00905         PgOptionsSAXHandler handler(this, vFileNames);
00906         parser->setDocumentHandler(&handler);
00907         parser->setErrorHandler(&handler);
00908         parser->setValidationScheme(XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::SAXParser::Val_Auto);
00909         parser->setDoNamespaces(false);
00910         parser->setDoSchema(false);
00911         parser->setValidationSchemaFullChecking(false);
00912         
00913         //
00914         //  Ok, lets do the progressive parse loop. On each time around the
00915         //  loop, we look and see if the handler has found what its looking
00916         //  for. When it does, we fall out then.
00917         //
00918         unsigned long duration;
00919     int errorCount = 0;
00920         try
00921         {
00922                 // Create a progressive scan token
00923                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPScanToken token;
00924                 const unsigned long startMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00925                 try
00926                 {
00927                         XMLCh* p = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::transcode(strFileName.c_str());
00928                         try
00929                         {
00930                                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::URLInputSource source(p);
00931                                 if (!parser->parseFirst(source, token))
00932                                 {
00933                                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Cannot open or parse xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);
00934                                 }
00935                         }
00936                         catch(...)
00937                         {                               
00938                                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::LocalFileInputSource source(p);
00939                                 if (!parser->parseFirst(source, token))
00940                                 {
00941                                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Cannot open or parse xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);
00942                                 }
00943                         }
00944                         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLString::release(&p);
00945                         //
00946                         //  We started ok, so lets call scanNext() until we find what we want
00947                         //  or hit the end.
00948                         //
00949                         bool gotMore = true;
00950                         while (gotMore && !parser->getErrorCount())
00951                         {
00952                                 gotMore = parser->parseNext(token);
00953                         }
00954 
00955                         const unsigned long endMillis = XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::getCurrentMillis();
00956                         duration = endMillis - startMillis;
00957 
00958                         errorCount = parser->getErrorCount();
00959                         //
00960                         //  Reset the parser-> In this simple progrma, since we just exit
00961                         //  now, its not technically required. But, in programs which
00962                         //  would remain open, you should reset after a progressive parse
00963                         //  in case you broke out before the end of the file. This insures
00964                         //  that all opened files, sockets, etc... are closed.
00965                         //
00966                         parser->parseReset(token);
00967                 }
00968                 catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
00969                 {
00970                         Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
00971                 } 
00972                 catch(...) {Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() Exception thrown while parsing xml-file. FileName: " + strFileName);}
00973         }
00974         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::OutOfMemoryException&)
00975         {               
00976                 delete parser;
00977                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();                    
00978                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an OutOfMemoryException. FileName: " + strFileName);
00979         }
00980         catch (const XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLException& toCatch)
00981         {
00982                 delete parser;
00983                 XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00984                 Err::errAbort("PgOptions::setParametersFromXMLFile() failed with an XMLException. Msg: " + PgOptionsSAXHandler::toString(toCatch.getMessage()) + " FileName: " + strFileName);
00985         }
00986         
00987 //      Verbose::out(1, "XMLFileName = " + strFileName + ", OptionCount = " + ToStr(handler.getOptionCount()));
00988         Verbose::out(1, "*");
00989         delete parser;
00990         XERCES_CPP_NAMESPACE::XMLPlatformUtils::Terminate();
00991         vFileNames.pop_back();
00992 #endif
00993 }
